result.content:
Expand All | Collapse All
  Included page: .TrainingApplication.AcceptanceTests.DomainLayer.DeviceStatistics.CreateNode.SetUp (edit)

Create Node - Documentation and Test



Import
org.training.fitnesse.node

Rule:
If we create a new node we've to define it's factory given serial number and the allowd max number devices. In short these are required attribute.
CreateNode
serial number
Could not find field: serial number.		 max number of devices
